thread.section_title: Hotel Giuliana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: "The ideal hotel in Rome"
thread.title_full: "The ideal hotel in Rome" - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: christos g
title: "The ideal hotel in Rome"
text: Small, cosy hotel, with spacious rooms and comfortable beds.Very clean, with a cute, little balcony for persistent smokers. The staff is friendly and helpful with great suggestions for restaurants and places worth visiting.The most important is the central location of the hotel. It's very close to Termini train and bus station and within walking distance from the most important sights, yet very calm and quiet.It will certainly be our choice whenever we come back to Rome.
